name: Death Mark: Experience Selection
summary: The game’s story is based on a rumor that alleges that in Tokyo’s “H” district those who receive a death seal will die. There have been cases in which people that had a mysterious mark appear suddenly on their body have died without an explanation, causing the spreading of the rumor.Some think that the seal is caused by encountering a ghost, or being affected by a curse. Those who have the death seals are suddenly called to a certain villa. The protagonist is one of them, and is greeted by a beautiful talking doll that welcomes him to “Kujou Mansion.” The doll warns him that he will die if he doesn’t manage to do something about it.
